events.title: WINE WEDNESDAYS
descriptions: Special occasions (like Wednesdays) should always be celebrated with a glass of wine! Hop on over to Roger for 25% off any bottle of wine on our menu. Cheers!

events.title: DIERKS BENTLEY: BEERS ON ME TOUR
descriptions: Concerts are back at Shoreline Amphitheatre! Get tickets to the Beers on Me Tour 2021 with Dierks Bentley, Riley Green and Parker McCollum.
Make a night of it with an overnight stay at The Ameswell Hotel and dinner and drinks before the show (and more drinks after) at Roger Bar and Restaurant.
You can detox the next day with our complimentary yoga class…

events.title: YOGA ON THE LAWN
descriptions: Join us for an outdoor Hatha yoga class on our expansive outdoor lawn. You will be led through poses focused on alignment, and designed to strengthen, stretch, and balance your body to leave you feeling energized.
All levels of experience are welcome. Please bring your mat. Hotel guests may request a mat from the Front Desk. Class is complimentary. Space is limited.
Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: WINE WEDNESDAYS
descriptions: Special occasions (like Wednesdays) should always be celebrated with a glass of wine! Hop on over to Roger for 25% off any bottle of wine on our menu. Cheers!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH JIMMY ASHLEY
descriptions: Come enjoy rock and country favorites with acoustic guitarist and singer, Jimmy Ashley. Sing along to everything from Ed Sheeran and Elton John to Willie Nelson and Bob Marley over dinner and drinks at Roger.  Jimmy’s crowd-pleasing music appeals to every audience so bring your friends and family!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH CARLOS REYES
descriptions:
World-renowned harpist and violinist, Carlos Reyes, is performing at Roger! This Grammy Award-winning artist has played around the globe with legendary performers like Willie Nelson, Steve Miller, MC Hammer and the Doobie Brothers.
Don’t miss this special opportunity to see Carlos perform at such an intimate venue, and prepare to be blown away by his sheer genius!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH MICHELLE LAMBERT
descriptions: Rising star, Michelle Lambert, brings a world of experience when she steps up to the microphone. Hailing from the Bay Area, Lambert began studying violin at age 2 and has continued making music ever since. A pop, folk and hip-hop artist whose career has taken her across the U.S. and abroad, she is influenced by her studies in Celtic music.

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH CARLOS REYES
descriptions:
World-renowned harpist and violinist, Carlos Reyes, is performing at Roger! This Grammy Award-winning artist has played around the globe with legendary performers like Willie Nelson, Steve Miller, MC Hammer and the Doobie Brothers.

events.title: LIVE MUSIC: SHE IS JULES
descriptions: San Francisco Bay-Area-born, songstress and top-liner, She Is Jules--formerly known as "JULES", has accumulated over 800K streams on Spotify alone. She is Jules' trenchant lyrics contrasted with her ethereal pop vocals, creates a safe space in her music to be especially vulnerable and much like herself; quirky.

events.title: YOGA ON THE LAWN
descriptions: Join us for an outdoor Hatha yoga class on our expansive outdoor lawn. You will be led through poses focused on alignment, and designed to strengthen, stretch, and balance your body to leave you feeling energized.
All levels of experience are welcome. Please bring your mat. Hotel guests may request a mat from the Front Desk. Class is complimentary. Space is limited.
Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH MEGAN CHENOT
descriptions: World-traveling solo performer Megan Chenot's set list has been called "all spice, no filler" as her extraordinarily versatile voice covers favorites from the 80s, 90s, classic rock and Motown eras, and much more. Using a looping pedal on her vocals, she creates intricate live harmonies and fun arrangements of an eclectic mix of crowd-pleasers and curveballs.

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH CARLOS REYES
descriptions:
World-renowned harpist and violinist, Carlos Reyes, is performing at Roger! This Grammy Award-winning artist has played around the globe with legendary performers like Willie Nelson, Steve Miller, MC Hammer and the Doobie Brothers.

events.title: WINE WEDNESDAYS
descriptions: Special occasions (like Wednesdays) should always be celebrated with a glass of wine! Hop on over to Roger for 25% off any bottle of wine on our menu. Cheers!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH KINGSBOROUGH
descriptions: Join us for an acoustic performance with frontman, Billy Kingsborough, and lead guitarist, Alex Leach, of San Francisco’s Kingsborough.  Influenced by the sounds and songwriting of The Beatles, The Black Keys, and Led Zeppelin, Kingsborough form a bond with fans by unleashing a brand of potent rock n’ roll that No Depression calls “laced with a vintage elegance that appeals to an ever-changing audience.” Produced by Grammy-nominated producer Damien Page Lewis (Rihanna, Katy Perry), Kingsborough’s second album, 1544, turned out the singles "Low Down" and "Subtle Lies.

Join us after class for Sunday Brunch at Roger!

events.title: LIVE MUSIC WITH BRANDON PASION
descriptions: Brandon Pasion us a SF Bay Area based singer songwriter. His heart-driven lyrics and melodies call back to the timeless storytelling of country music's glory days, supported by clean, powerful vocals that reveal his jazz roots and impeccable artistry.
